summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2646, for the improvement of 24th Avenue South, from Atlantic Street to Walker Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues all in the City of Seattle, by grading and curbing the same, by planking and constructing wood walks on Rainier Avenue from Atlantic Street to Bayview Street, and providing for the necessary surface drainage, under Ordinance No. 31080 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
